channel.title: MooseVille Development - Webclient Coder Needed
channel.description: Well i have bought a domain and and hosting and we have everything running smooth, except one thing, we need a webclient coder that can give us the files and tell us EXACTLY how to add them to the website so it is playable online, (and if anyone knows anything about this i heard a rumor that its possible to host rs serves on MySQL databases without your comp even being on? I also want to know if this is true cuz i have 10 =\) If you would like to help you will get mod on the server (which isnt easy to get we have like...2-3 in about 1 1/2 the server's been up :P and you will be added to the staff list. If you are interested or are a nice person please help =] Some info you may need. 1. I use godaddy hosting service. 2. I have 10 MYSQL databases 3. And its not some dumb freewebs its an actual domain, If you want to take a look here it is http://mooseftw.com

omg nice name! thats why that name was taken lol… anyway im looking to find maybe a tut on webclients? so far only ones i’ve found have been removed

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

Gonby, get dreamweaver, change the links and everything directly in the display, and it will update and generate the CSS and HTML needed for the site, then simply upload but whats happening if you dont have the images the CSS needs, get them.

Read full topic
